## ExtensionTags interface

The shape of the tag data stored by the extension manager.

This data can be used by other extensions to dynamically determine which nodes should affected by commands / plugins / keys etc...

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtensionTags<GNodes extends string = string, GMarks extends string = string, GPlain extends string = string> 
```

|  [mark](./core-types.extensiontags.mark.md) | <code>MarkExtensionTags&lt;GMarks&gt;</code> |  |
|  [node](./core-types.extensiontags.node.md) | <code>NodeExtensionTags&lt;GNodes&gt;</code> |  |
